This was from Sandy, I am passing it on here as well . .. .

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Sandra Panico <magicquartz@...>
Date: Mon, 17 Sep 2012 11:54:37 -0700 (PDT)
Subject: [TFONOOC] I am leaving yahoo for good.



Respect those as you wish to be respected.

To everyone who knows me..  I want to say that I am saying good bye to
you from yahoo, due to the fact that yahoo is no longer a good service
in my behalf.  Those of you who are associated with me, in the groups,
it was fun doing it, and yes, you have my permission to end my
character's existence at the groups.  Airly if you can hear me, i'm
sorry to be leaving yahoo but it's too much for me now.  I'm going to
the groups now to terminate my membership.  It's been fun.  Please
find me at panicosandy@....  I will be there from now on.  Bye
for now.  But not forever.
